title: unnai allAl gati illaiyE
sahitya:
unnai allAl gati illaiyE vAzhum upAyam enakku nI shollaiyE paramA


anupallavi

  tannala vanjamum satikAra nenjamum innal shei nanjamum minjiya ulagilE


caraNam    vAyaDiyArp-pizhaikka vAsAlagamillai vaLam perum pugazh pera viLambarangaLum illai
sEyEn un aruLaiyE tAi ena nambinEn cittap-puyalil sikkit-tattaLikkum siriyEn
